blocks.title: Software Engineer
activities: I develop fullstack software for the Seller Management Team using NestJS, React, GitOps, and Terraform. My work focuses on building scalable applications, maintaining cloud infrastructure, and streamlining deployment processes, all while collaborating with other teams to enhance Marketplace sellers‘ experience.

blocks.title: Software Engineer
activities: Assisted in the development and launch of a new publishing platform for the VRM group, which powers all its news websites, including Allgemeine Zeitung, Echo Online, Wiesbadener Kurier, Wormser Zeitung, and more.

blocks.title: Software Developer Intern
activities: ES6, React, React Native, Vue.js and vanilla JS
Storybook, Strapi headless CMS, Webpack 4, Docker, Gitlab CI, TDD, TYPO3
Contributed to various projects for multiple company clients.

blocks.title: Software Testing Intern
blocks.description: I worked on the following tasks:
activities: Setup of the javascript unit tests environment with karma, jasmine and node.js
Implementation of build scripts in ANT and MS-DOS

blocks.title: Software Engineer
activities: Contracted by T-Mobile US to help create customer facing onboarding pages at t-mobile.com/support using Vue.js / TypeScript & PHP / Laravel, AWS, GitLab CI/CD stack with CWAG AA/AAA accessibility rating and accessibility compliance auditing.
Assisted internal T-Mobile engineering teams in testing, diagnosing and debugging production issues, creating documentation, code standards for engineering teams.
Contracted by Integrity Testing an Australian Structural Engineering firm, to assist on dev team for creating an internal React.js, TypeScript, Node.js and AWS Serverless application.

educationBlocks.summary: Pursued Masters of Computer Science (specialization Software Engineering) | Grade: 1.7
educationBlocks.description: Topics in Software Engineering, Software Quality Assurance, High performance Computing, Testing and Model checking.
